players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found him to be the mafia. Alice was the first victim. Please vote Bob out."
You: "I was in the shop, Charlie was alone. I don't know what he was doing. Maybe he hid something."
Charlie: "I was with Bob, I didn't see Charlie alone."
Charlie: "Bob was with me, but we saw him kill Alice. Vote Bob."
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found him to be mafia. He killed Alice. Your claim that he was there is true. Even knowing I'm detective, I trust the evidence. Vote Bob."
You: remained silent.

players.name: Charlie

Diana: "I investigated Bob and found him to be the mafia. Alice was the first victim. Please vote Bob out."
Bob: "I was in the shop, Charlie was alone. I don't know what he was doing. Maybe he hid something."
You: "I was with Bob, I didn't see Charlie alone."
You: "Bob was with me, but we saw him kill Alice. Vote Bob."
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found him to be mafia. He killed Alice. Your claim that he was there is true. Even knowing I'm detective, I trust the evidence. Vote Bob."
Bob: remained silent.
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Bob and found him to be the mafia. Alice was the first victim. Please vote Bob out."
Bob: "I was in the shop, Charlie was alone. I don't know what he was doing. Maybe he hid something."
Charlie: "I was with Bob, I didn't see Charlie alone."
Charlie: "Bob was with me, but we saw him kill Alice. Vote Bob."
You: "I investigated Bob and found him to be mafia. He killed Alice. Your claim that he was there is true. Even knowing I'm detective, I trust the evidence. Vote Bob."
Bob: remained silent.
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
